articles.title: Longer Hours of Sunlight Linked to Higher Covid-19 Incidence: Study - Yahoo India News
articles.description: The research, published in the journal Geographical Analysis, indicates that sunny days can tempt more people out even if this means a higher risk of infection.
articles.content:
While higher heat and humidity may slow the spread of COVID-19, longer hours of sunlight are associated with a higher incidence of the disease, according to a study.
